summary: The module defines foundational classes and a registry that support the implementation of CloudFormation resource security checks within the Checkov framework. It includes utilities for converting resource definitions into IAM policies, performing permissions analysis with cloudsplaining, handling generic value and negativeâ€‘value validations, and managing the registration and retrieval of check definitions.
business_intent: To provide a reusable infrastructure for building and executing security and compliance checks on AWS CloudFormation templates, helping users identify risky configurations such as overly permissive IAM policies or invalid property values.
